titles.title: When He Calls Me, I Will Answer

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
When He calls me, I will answer.
When He calls me, I will answer.
When He calls me, I will answer.
I'll be somewhere listening for my name.
Chorus:
I'll be somewhere listening, I'll be somewhere listening,
I'll be somewhere listening for my name.
I'll be somewhere listening, I'll be somewhere listening,
I'll be somewhere listening for my name.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
With a glad heart, I will answer...
With a willing heart, I will answer...
With a joyful heart, I will answer...
With a faithful heart, I will answer...

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I'll be in Him listening, I'll be in Him listening,
I'll be in Him listening for my name.
I'll be in Him listening, I'll be in Him listening,
I'll be in Him listening for my name.
